alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:56PM CDT until March 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS AND SOUTHERN PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Louisiana, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Atlas and Clarksville around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pleasant Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern and west central Illinois...and northeastern and east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
